Module LAB_06
Package ki304.salahub.Lab6

Class Gun

java.lang.Object
ki304.salahub.Lab6.Gun
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ki304.salahub.Lab6.WeaponObject>, ki304.salahub.Lab6.WeaponObject
public class Gun extends Object implements ki304.salahub.Lab6.WeaponObject
The Gun class represents a type of weapon object, specifically a firearm. It implements the WeaponObject interface and provides information about the length, material, title, and caliber of the gun.
Since:
2023-11-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andriy
